Card works, got it because the price and my new Galaxy Note10+. Figured I'd upgrade everything, only complaint it that it did not arrive on time. Came in 2 days late, even though I got an email saying it was shipped, but never was shipped until 2 days after. Glad it's a legit memory card and works great on my Note10+.

I guess I run cards hard (phones with app2sd, dashcams, etc) because they're always dying on me. The Samsung Evos seem to last the longest of all the brands I've tried. I bought 3 Sony's once figuring they had to be good and the last one hit the trash in about 5 or 6 months. The Samsungs are the only ones I buy anymore.

I like this Micro S D card because it worked and fit so well with my new Samsung A71-5G. It is easy to install due to its shape you can't put it in anyway but the right way. One drop install. I also liked the package, you could get in and easily remove the card.

I am not a geek so I cannot comment on the technical merits of this SD card except to say it works great in my VAVA 2K duel dash cam. I formatted it on my computer and installed it in the VAVA camera and I am so happy with the quality of the video files. I have purchased other brands of SD cards before and had problems but I am now a believer in in the Samsung SD cards...they work!

Memory card DID NOT have 32GB. I bought 2 and both had less storage than advertised. It only appeared to be 29GB before recording anything on one, and the other had 27. Those lost gigs make a difference when continuously recording. Why false advertise??

This is a great micro SD card from a leader in storage. I also got this for $30 so nothing to complain about. This works nicely as additional storage for my Switch. We were able to put all the downloaded content on this card. Great product!
On my 2018 MBPro I got 63MB/s write and 91MB/s read. Great card for the money, will work great for GoPro and DJI 4k video footage.

I had some bad experience with a cheap SD-card. But this Samsung EVO select is good enough for my camera. It works both of video and picture on my digital camera. I can get enough space when I take a 4k video. I'm very happy with this one. It is a good price value item.

I bought this SD Card as an add-on item to qualify for free-shipping because I didn’t have Amazon Prime at that time. But,  it turned out a good product which is really small. I used it for my dash camera for my mom’s car ( because there was no SD card in the dash cam I ordered). It is good enough for me to save videos of roadway or wherever the car passed up tonow. In addition, I can utilize this SD card for my senior project ( i need it to store the codes, and the program to use on Rasberry Pi board). Anyway, good experience when buying this product from this seller.

I tried numerous times to format it and write UnifiPI OS to it, but it would keep failing.  Grabbed another Samsung card I had installed in a tablet (the Orange Flavor) and it worked just fine.  Put this Green card into a Samsung tablet my kids use, seemingly no problem...  Maybe I just got a dud?  But it does appear to work fine inside my kid's tablet.  I'd hesitate to order another for a raspberry PI requirement.

Perfect for my 360' Security Camera IP Wireless. I didn't realize how much memeory 32GB memory is when running this camera and I was delighted to see that I can run it almost all day and come home from work to see everything that did (and did not happen)The price is reasonable and clicks right in. No problem.

I put this in my Note 20 Ultra 5G and have not noticed any speed decreases in saving photos or recording video. Even if I did notice I likely wouldn't complain because my storage is usually filled by concert photos/videos. Sigh can we get back to normal and have concerts again....

I got this for the camera, somehow it corrupted twice after a week. Sadly it transfers files very slow, I found the chips  bend a tiny bit when opening up and even don't know if it was damaged or not. Google Samsung online support but not exact information was found.

Got the item and wanted to use it for my Nintendo Switch to up the storage on it. Turned my Switch off, put the SD card in, and turned my Switch back on. The screen went into a standby phase, with the screen just being backlit, and would not turn off or on. When I went to remove the SD card, it was EXTREMELY hot, almost felt like touching a stove. Obvious sign that the card was counterfeit.

I don't know I bought this for my video camera. In my old memory card the video format was different as it was easily open in any phone but when I make video in this memory card it makes a different format I looked into all the option of my camera as well as videos online to fix the issue but still cannot figure out.
Its a good deal. What more can I say, I mean its a memory card 🤷‍♂️. It works, thats all that matters.Cant believe you actually read a review on this. lol

Did not realize that the Samsung 32GB 95MB/s (U1) microSDHC EVO Select Memory Card only has 20MB/s write speeds. Very slow Write speeds. (not good). Read speeds are OK at 95MB/s.The 64GB has 100MB/s read and 60MB/s write speeds (better), and the 128GB, 256GB and 512GB has 100MB/s read and 90MB/s write speeds (best). Read speeds are always pretty good but 20MB/s write speed SUCKS!

Exactly what I needed to increase memory on my Motorola G7 Power cell phone.  I am using the memory to increase the available memory for applications.  The only glitch was learning how to format the memory on my cell phone before I could take advantage of it.
Works great from the start. And being Samsung, I'll pay the extra 2 bucks over the no name Chinese units.My LG V20 loves it!

It's not my first one I buy although this time didn't work for me... Tried it in a brand new camera and I got "card error" message so I had to return it. Now, I have another two cards like this that work just fine, so I like the Samsung cards but not this one I bought

Excellent. Fast access.  Had previously bought and returned cheap cards that worked briefly in my security cameras. Each one would eventually result in a “storage corrupt” message.  Have not had that issue with the Samsung ones.  Excellent value.

Our Daughter has purchased several other brands of memory cards and found the Samsung brand delivered the best performance and length of life.  She said the other brands either failed within months of installing them in whatever device she was using them in but the Samsung cards are still working. Based on her experience, we purchased this card for our smartphones.

I got this card and adapter to use with my computer and Raspberry Pi. At first, I could access the card but it wouldn't let me put files on it or reformat it. Now, my computer won't even recognize it as a disk. I'm pretty annoyed as I need a working microSD for a school assignment that's coming up in a week or so.  After reading some of the other reviews about fake cards, I checked mine and it has white plastic on the sides and black on the bottom and looks genuine to me. I'm shipping this one back and trying my luck on getting an exact replacement.

32GB - The first  phone(Alcatel Raven - $30 Walmart tracfone) I tried it in told me I needed a faster memory card or I might experience delays, so far I haven't experienced any.The second phone (LG Stylo 3 - WFM), didn't tell me anything, and it seems to be working great so far! I didn't buy another one of these when I needed another one due to the low write speed (I thought that might be the issue the first phone had.) I got a larger memory card with a faster write speed.

My cameras (Canon 60d's) were experiencing issues saving photos, and I couldn't do any videos. Bought two of these cards, one for each camera, on a lark.Went to my first show, and they performed perfectly. No problem keeping up with my shooting (RAW - 25MB/photo), and I was able to take videos with no glitches.

I purchased this SD card to put it in my dual dash camera. I have a lot of SD cards already, but I needed this particular one because a U3. It was easy to take out of the package and install it in the camera. I purchased enough GB’s to last me a full driving day.

If you recently purchased a gopro 9 and you are wondering if this will work. It does work perfectly fine in my go pro 9. I have not had any issues. It was not on the list of recommended cards when I purchased it. I will most likely but a second one soon.

Have only used for a few weeks, but so far no failures or glitches with transfers, speed seems plenty fine for my phone, and the included adapter works well too.  Can't really say much more, as I did not test it's actual speed, so as long as it stays reliable I'll be pleased.  Got one for a friend as well, and can report the same for their card too...  Big, long established brand for a crazy inexpensive price = a sure buy from me.  Thanks for reading my review.

I've been using these in my Raspberry Pi's and they work very well. Plenty of capacity choices to meet your specific needs. They come in packing that is fairly easy to open and keeps you from dropping the small MicroSD card when you open the package. They also include a full-size SD adapter if you need it. Have not had one of these fail yet.

Please Change DESCRIPTION from U3 to U1 like what it shows in the PICTURES. It is misleading.  I was going to return this item, I was looking for U3 for 4k video, but decided to keep it for my lower resolution video camera.

Purchased for a raspberry pi and ran without issue for several years.  Bought this one given the consistent behavior of the previous one purchased.  At under $0.25 cents per gb they're great value for the money.

Love these little things! They’re cheap and come with an adapter so I can use them as a standard SD card in a pinch. I put them everywhere just in case I need an SD card, and because they work as both micro and full sized I can have them as a backup for my drone and camera alike.

My last (Kingston) memory card died after ~2 years of on and off use with all the data on it. So I wanted something more reliable. Have used this card for 3 months straight. No issues so far. Will try to update the review in some time to share the status.--------------------------------------

We got this to use in a dashboard camera for my wife's vehicle. We've had it in for two weeks and it's been working great. Man, I remember when this exact card was $50+! $20 is an absolute steal, and Samsung is the best in the business I believe. I love that it comes with the adapter, it makes my life so much easier when hooking up to my PC. Does just what I need it to, and doesnt fail. Recommend for anyone looking for extra storage via MicroSD.

Bought this more local storage on my Roku 3, which has recently complained of needing more storage space to improve app performance. Bought for my samsung galaxy to replace a tiny 2gb card & speed up phone bc advertises samsung on product and oem products work better, however this wasnt genuine it was made in china and this 32gb card even slowed down processes on my phone not to mention samsung will not verify registration for products they didnt make or that are bought out of country. So happy when an IT friend recommended this product! Finally I can afford one and even comes with much more memory space, yay!
I had a 128 GB SD card with 100 GB on it, when my GS7 died. Just transferred the whole thing to the 256 GB SD card (about 3 hours) and then just popped the card into my new GS10.Plenty of leg room.

Very sturdy package. Exercise caution when opening so you don't break Card. Available in different capacities. I have several 32 MB that I use instead of usb stick. Reliable storage, acceptable read/write speed, Name brand, Great Value!Walter O.

Excellent cards. I’been using these in dash cameras, GoPros and DJI Mavic Pro drone for two years. The durability is excellent given the conditions and environment these devices endure. No issues and no failures, so can’t ask more than that.

I am a fan of Samsung memory.  When they go on sale I grab them.  I have no issue with them before and always reliable to me.  I pop it in my cell phone and no need to pay extra hundred of dollars a cell phone with larger memory capacity.  It is fast read and writes and I do not see any delays.

After 2 or so months of use, the card reported being "write protected" and nothing would change it. Couldn't write on it or erase anything so due to having sensitive data on it,  I ended up having to destroy  the card rather than returning.

As usual the Samsung Micro SD card I purchased does it's job! The 32GB is the largest I have purchased so far. This card is for my Blu 8L smartphone. I take a lot of photos and videos on my smartphones. The files write quickly to the SD card. I don't see any lagging at all.So far all the Samsung Micro SD cards I have purchased in the last 5-8 years have held up well and are still going strong. I highly recommend that you give this card a try. You will not regret it.

32GB card only lasted 11 months and Samsung refuses to warranty. Was left in a Kindle Fire for 5 months unused and Samsung claims that's why it failed which is a BS excuse. These are non volatile storage. They don't fail from "lack of use" which is a ridiculous claim.

This was a real deal.  should have bought several.  Ill never run out of storage space for my photos. I am a photo nut and love to steal everyones pictures, So i have about 9K or more. This is a wonderful buy.  I can afford to share my photos with family members at this price.  Since I sort and categorize everything they can pic and chose what they want to look at or delete.  Now i dont have to do it for them.

I've had a few different SD Cards from other Manufacturers and they always seem to Fail  way sooner than I thought they should.  These Samsung EVO sd cards seem to really go the distance I now use these in all of my digital devices.

I purchased this I believe close to a year ago. I've had trouble in the past with HC micro SD cards failing after a short time owning them, but not in this case. Of all the brands I used, this is the only one that damaged one of my three dashcams because of the heat from a device. This brand has terrible physical properties that make the unit to swell and get staked inside ruining your device. Low quality manufacture (Made in Chine).

Infuriating! Attempting to use the card in the supplied card reader gives me ReadOnly errors. This micro sd card was horribly packed. It came in this white thin not padded bag so the actual package was bent and torn like somebody tried to open it. Also, this is 32 gb but when you use it there is only space for 29 gb of usage.

There is a reason why the name brand companies like Samsung and its competitors are all similar prices for the size (in GB) and the other knock off names are 50% of the cost per GB. Read about how a drive or SD card can provide false data to the operating system.  They are selling you a 4GB card with a false label.  I use Samsung SD cards for a GoPro, cell phone, Zoom Audio Recorder and a Mavic Pro drone.  Works great in all of them.  High-speed, high resolution cameras work well in the 32GB as well as the 256GB size.

So far so good.  It has doubled the size of my hard drive and seems to be the genuine Samsung and not a cheap ripoff.  I was a little skeptical about getting one after reading about some fraudulent cards, but that (I hope) is an uncommon occurrence.

This is a pretty good value micro-SD card from Samsung. It stores sufficient data and fits perfectly to my Kindle HD tablet to expand storage. Not sure about its data transfer speed, since I have to transition data into computer yet.

Read many reviews and after a lot of research going over numerous SD cards I decided to get the Samsung EVO Select. I have not been disappointed! Very impressed at its speed and quality at such a bargain price. I have been using it for my RG350M gaming device and it has worked superbly.
Not sure why it’s advertised as read/write speed of 100/90 mbs but the product receive is only 100/60 mbs.My purchased was based on advertised speeds

I like Samsung products. My phones, TVs, and major appliances are all Samsung. I would give this micro SD card 5 stars if it weren't for the defective adapters. Ordered from Amazon Warehouse seller, card seems original. Made in korea , Adapter is made in china and 1 year guaranteed.Holds photos and videos on my Samsung s10 with minimal to no errors.

This is really a great  little piece of technology for the price; pretty amazing really. I ordered this card on two separate occasions. These work great in my security cameras. I believe the continuous rewriting the cameras perform put a heavy load on any sd card. The first one has been running in a camera for about two months with no problems. I did not have any issues with this product. I have purchased many memory items from Samsung and will continue to return to them because I have never had an issue with their products. The added SD converter was a lovely gift for an already inexpensive product.

Just bought an action camera and had an extra SanDisk micro SD card laying around. Purchase to power my dash cam I use this and it works perfect record many hours of video. The 128 GB also allows me to store a lot of video without having to recycle and get new cards every time. Would buy again

The best deal especially this size card. I purchased for my Nintendo Switch and I love how much it holds I have NBA NK19 and 20 installed with so much extra room. Great buy and such a good deal I might buy a second just to have. If you have a Switch and I definitely recommend this card.

Supremely happy. My Note 8 took to it like I take to an all you can eat buffet at the Trump Hotel! Jk, but seriously I was able to transfer a lot to it and it should ensure that my Note 8 stays speedy as it starts to Advance in age.Thanks Samsung and Amazon!

When I bought my Kodi tv box, I was planning on using high capacity memory cards. I purchased this card for the latest Amazon Kindle Fire HD 10 9th Gen (2019). The Fire seamlessly allowed formatting as internal memory. Media downloads and retrievals are quick and glitch-free. I'm very satisfied.

The card includes a SD Card adapter for devices that only have a regular SD card slot. The packaging opens easily by cutting with a pair of scissors on the dotted line.

This 32GB card was a great value at under $10. And, it travels well because it's X-ray proof meaning pics won't be lost because your bags are scanned at the airport! Also, I think it's great when you can use a Samsung media product with one of their devices. I own multiple Galaxy phones including a Note 9. Samsung SD cards have not let me down yet.

I've been running VIOFO dashcams for a while and using high-endurance cards without issue.  After upgrading to 4K recently, the smaller capacity cards would no longer cut it so I decided to take a chance on this Samsung card based on other's recommendations for use in dashcams, even lacking the "high-endurance" moniker.  It helped a lot that I caught it on sale as well.It's worked flawlessly so far.  I'll update my review if it prematurely kicks the bucket.
Received a dud. Defective. It read nothing. Tried multiple devices. Nothing. Amazon assisted and issued refund - and they want the dead card back. I wonder if this is a QC issue with Samsung.
I don't have much to say about this card as it works perfectly for my camera and the other reviews speak for themselves. Awesome product. I will be purchasing this product again.
Working well for my new go pro black 7. Haven't tried it on 4k yet but should be more than enough according to specs. Good price, better than the ones that come with the camera.
I bought this as a birthday gift for my sister, she hasn't complained at all so I'm assuming she's happy with it. I've had real good personal experiences with these Samsung memory cards though.

Currently using this in a Wireless Security Bullet Camera 1/4" CMOS,720P HD IP66 Waterproof Night/Day Outdoor Surveillance Camera with Motion Detection,4sdot and is working flawlessly. Will make this purchase again in the future.

So far, it’s working well for my Nintendo Switch! Once putting it in, my switch prompted me to update it and after doing so and going to the storage settings, I could see the available storage available.So far so good!
Comes very close to its rated capacity. Write speeds are quite slow, though, averaging just under 20Mb/S. Still a decent value and, having had more than one of these, I can attest to its durability.
I have already purchased 3 of the EVO series, 2 of 128 GB and 1 of 256 GB. I have used them on 3 different devices and they have performed excellent on all of them. This card is really good.

We use these memory cards in Raspberry Pi computers and they have been working great. They are very reliable as the Raspberry Pi systems we put together are used as kiosks for nursing documentation and they are operational 24/7. They also come with the Adapter for the full size SD but we don't have a use for those. Does not hurt having them around though.

I’ve tried a few other brands, and I personally feel like I get the most bang for my buck with these. I can’t speak for the larger capacities as the largest I’ve used is 128, but for me reliability is the largest selling point for storage, and I have piece of mind with these. Also the 10 year warranty is a huge plus should anything go wrong.

I have stuck by Samsung micro and sd cards for quite a few years and they never fail.  When they came out with the evo, I tried it and wow, it is fast and never gets error codes and a need to reformat like other cards.  This new card, green, the other one is orange, is less expensive and just as good.  I highly recommend this product.

I used this card to download and transfer the NOOBS OS to my Raspberry Pi3 and it works like a charm. Having 32 GB vs the typical 8 is just a huge plus. If you are working on a Pi, I totally suggest this product. Also good for plenty of other projects. Good storage for a small device. Fast access to data. All around good.
Phenomenal price for a 128gb micro SD. Everyone knows samsung makes high quality products so you can rest assure you have a great performing card that will keep your data safe.

My camera won't recognize the card, my computer won't recognize the card. It won't format. It's just dead. Swap it back to my SanDisk and everything works. I bought this card just to try it out because it as a little bit cheaper. I learned my lesson.

Best SD card I've gotten!  I've recommended it to several friends/family. I bought more so I could use them on all my gadgets. I had previously purchased a different brand (SanDisk) and it corrupted all my files.  This Samsung card was perfect!!!!
By far, the fastest MicroSD card I have used for a tablet. Loads from PC several times faster than older cards, and even mounts and dismounts faster on Kindle Fire Tablet.
Blu G9Pro will not work with the 128gb U3 card.  THIS item is great, but the two just don't play well together.  Just so you are aware.  Just buy the 64gb U3 card and you'll be fine.
memory card' read/write speed is very fast
Would be nice if it stored more than games.
Works great for extra space on my phone
Packaging was fine, but we used these cards (we bought 2) for less than 6 months for game cameras and they already stopped working. A refund or return would be much appreciated.

Bought this before a trip to Hawaii and used it all over the island.  Carried and shot video, used the waterproof case near / in the water, even bought a GoPro brand car mount and mounted it and drove around!  Very highly recommended, only criticism is the battery goes pretty quick when continuously recording at a high resolution, but that's to be expected.  A+++ super worth the price
Works on Nintendo Switch.  For downloading games and updates put the switch close to your modem. It will go faster. Your welcome.

I'm using this card in my drone, Mavic Mini and it's working perfectly. I've used Samsung cards before and they're very reliable. Product is authentic and great price on the item. Got it on a flash sale from Amazon.

I did not need to configure this for my game camera, just put it in the camera slot and placed the camera.  It holds over 250 brief videos the camera recorded.  After viewing them, I deleted them and placed the camera in a new spot ready to record a new batch.  Just wish the game was a cooperative as the card :).
Have ordered twice over last few years, but second didn’t work, so had to return. Could be a fluke, but 50% working is a bit of concern. Didn’t try a 3rd time to avoid the needless hassle.

The the speed of 64 GB SIM card is U1! I wanted to get a SIM card for my camera, and I only need 64 GB. I saw the 128 GB one first, I checked all the setting and they all looked good. Before I added it to the cart, I choose the 64 GB directly and I did not check again. When I received it and used it, I realized my camera did not support it because this speed is way too slow! Barely can find things that still use U1 class around me now. So please read carefully about the speed before you place the order!

Literally broken. I used the adapter given and it wouldn't connect to laptop. Used an Anker adapter that I knew works. I also know the PC SD card reader is broken. I finally tried plugging it into my blackberry's microSD card port, which I KNOW works (plugged in sandisk microSD)This is ACTUALLY  bad.
According to the reviews ome people have received fake or faulty cards, but the one I received today appears legitimate. Did not test capacity or speed but it works fine in my chartplotter.
The listing advertises the 64 GB card as 100 MB/s read and 90 MB/s write, cite: "Ultra Fast Read Write Speeds: Up to 100MB/S Read and 90MB/S Write Speeds". The listing is incorrect.
So many fake MicroSD cards online but this one was the real deal.  You can use software to test the capacity.  This one tested out perfect.

As fast as on board storage. An eye blink of a hitch at worst in my gallery. This card saved me seriously considering a new phone since updates and temporary cache were really eating up my storage. Great price and performance.

This Sdcard was the best bang for your buck and it worked pretty well on my nintendo switch. I was able to buy games online without having to worry about my memeory space. Installing and running games on this sdcard was very smooth. I highly recommend it!
It does exactly what its supposed to, no complaints. I use in my dash cam.
Excelente memoria Samsung me encanto
Great little card, I’m glad I waited for the prices to go down in there before I bought it. Does what it needs to do. I use it for my dash cam and it keeps up just fine on speed.
Ok it's not durable, I hit it with a hammer and it broke.Picture quality, well folks, no matter how many beers we shared together it wouldn't take a picture at all. So one star there.
i needed a large capacity microSD for my drone, and this works great. i pull photos and videos with a type-c dock on an iPad Pro while traveling, performance is good.

Very fast micro sd card and lots of storage!  I got this card for an HD video camera hat that I bought on Amazon, and it works perfectly.  My videos are crystal clear HD picture and fast uploads and downloads.  Recommend this card!
This product only last 9 months. cannot connect to wifi, I tried many many times reset wifi and camera. the seller does not help. beware of this product.

Now these are like $5? Wow. Seriously when i started using computers i doubt there was 32 gigs of storage in the whole world and now i can carry hundreds of gigs in my pocket. Holds many files works well with my pi 0w.
The price on this is excellent especially for the quality.  Samsung green is just Amazon's version of the red.  Same chip inside.  This thing can store tons of games.
I bought this SD Card for me new dash cam which only takes U3 type of memory cards. As soon as i got it i formatted it and installed it on my Dash Cam and it has been working great

So far so good with this and other Samsung MSD cards. Recently some of my SD cards have simply disintegrated and they were major brands including L & S. Some of the not-so-well-known SD cards seem better constructed and more durable. I have a couple of other Samsung MSD for a few years. Time will tell if they are durable enough.

Amazon listing claims 90MB/s write speed but packaging shows 60MB/s write speed.  I need the faster write speed to ensure seamless 4k recording.  The price is good and I'm sure this will work fine for standard HD recording.
I have bought this item 2 times now, one for my DJI Mavic 2 zoom and my Brave 7 LE action camera. It reads and writes fast enough to do the 4K 30fps that I record on my devices.

It perfectly matches with my switch. All data go fast without any disconnection. And it comes with a cassette and you can also use it as a SD card for camera or others. Anyway, it is much cheaper than Nintendo made and works well.
Quality Samsung product at a good price one thinks. Outside package says made in S. Korea. Looks real but stamped on product: Made in ChinaGood try pirates!
I have used several of these and have had great success.  They are fast and can be purchased now for such a great price.  Writing speed is as described, (well at least it is fast)

What can you say, it works.  Fast and without issue for now.  Good bang for buck for a solid memory card.  I received a Genuine one when I ran it against software.  Make sure you do as well as many counterfeit are showing up onsite.

Love the fact that don't have to worry about running out of space anytime soon.  Have used other Samsung microSD cards at a much smaller storage capacity and have never had any issues.  Would definitely recommend.
i use these in my WiFi security cams, they work fine and have not had any problems so far, 6 of these in 6 cameras. the oldest is 2+ years old the newest is a few days old.

These are slightly superior in my opinion to the Sandisk Ultra that are of a similar price point, mostly due to a higher transfer speed. Most people wouldn't notice it, but I use mine in my Android Phone and it matters, speed wise. Buy this SDHC card.
I bought this for a trail cam I got as a gift.  the little guy holds a ton of images and is holding up well to the pacific northwest weather inside the trail cam.  HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
I personally would recommend this SD card to use for dash cams, storage, cameras etc without breaking the bank. It’s speeds gets the job done especially for most devices that require an SD Card
These Samsung microSD cards work great in finicky products like the cheap action cams made in China. I've used them in many different electronic products and highly recommend them.
bought these for my old tablets, they seem to be working correctly, great value as of yet. I will review again if any issues should arise, but none are expected!

After messing around with some lower quaility (cheaper) SD cards in my DJI Spark, I went with this SD to capture my HD video. Works like a champ. No more alerts from the Spark telling me the memory isn't high enough quality.
I used "h2testw" to test the volumes and they were clean. The quality is good, the speeds are not as high as advertised, however, you are getting what you are paying for!

Samsung has some of the best storage devices on the market. When you go with Samsung, you know you are going to be getting top-notch quality storage devices. This is an amazing quality Micro SD. The speeds are great and it comes with an Adapter. A must have if looking for a Micro SD card. The price is perfect.
Worked for my sons Nintendo switch which is what we bought it for
Thought this was a great price for a 128gb card and it works perfectly with my Samsung Galaxy S6 pen tablet! Well worth it and would purchase again.
This is probably a fale samsung sd card, the card keeps saying its corrupted, it will not store data or record in my dash cam. Now i habe to waste my gas to return this cheap garbage

Samsung TV’s could be argued are as good as it gets ... and I’ve been very impressed with their micro sd cards also as this is my 4th purchase of them for my WYZE cameras, also purchased here on Amazon.
Bought for my new Mavic Air 2 drone as extra storage, I can say without a doubt this is a very stable and cost effective mini sd card. Great value!

I paid  a little  more for the name in my new phone. I sometimes have trouble opening these little packs though. Shipping was fast but the first one was DOA. No problems with the return.
We just returned from a cruise and this little guy worked great! (See video)

Got 3 of these for my family's Nintendo 3DS family of systems they were the largest supported cards for those and this one was a great deal my SO and I have 2 128GB cards as well from this line to use with our Nintendo Switches. No problems all work as they should. I haven't done speed test or anything but they work well for our purposes.
I put this in my Note 9.  It's working fine and have had no issues.  Price was right too!!
Popped right in and doubled my phone storage quickly and easily. I suggest checking your product manual before making your purchase. My wife's phone had a different limit then our tablet.
I've bought about half a dozen of these memory cards for digital cameras, dashcams, and trailcams.  These memory cards just plain WORK.  No hassle, very fairly priced.
The microSD card works but the adapter fails in some devices.  I thought it was my critter cam failing but it turns out the problem was the adapter they provided.  Other adapters worked.

Simple genuine Samsung microSD card.I needed a new 32gb microSD card for my dash cam and the cheapest brand name microSD card found on Amazon was this one. I've using it for a couple weeks and so far no issues. I've never had any issues with SD cards and expect this to be the same.
added extra space for my phone was able to add spotify songs,photos to the SD card but I  cant figure out how to add apps to SD card but it still worked.

The main unit did not recognize the backup camera, so that didn't work at all.  The menus have typos, some are mislabeled completely and the 10 min loop setting records for only 5 mins.  The internal calendar reset to Jan 1st everyday.  Makes a very loud, horrible sound at start up and shut down and I could not find a volume control or option to turn it off.  Instructions have many poorly worded description or no description at all.  Overall, a complete frustration waste of money.  AVOID.
Like the size and dislike the price a little.  Works perfect for cams that can use them or documents you want to keep private etc.They can hold large amounts of info if need to. Run real smooth.
Whenever I need a card for about anything, cameras, 3d printing, you name it. This is my choice theyre about as cheap as you can get and great quality.

I use them alot for filming for action shots some cameras crash when you go bigger for the money its worth it but it does have its problems sense the resolution on the camera is 4k I only get a couple of ours of filming but for the money it's not bad

Well there is not too much to write about these because they either work or not. So I’m giving them 5 stars because they worked! They were for my step kids Amazon Fire tablets. Those things don’t hold very much space and kids these days are constantly downloading new games. Would recommend for the Amazon Fire.
I use these for my Raspberry Pi and, well, it just works.

I was going to get a card with a smaller capacity to save money but these days the price difference is not significant. The only thing to watch out for is the capacity of the device you plan to use these in. Some cameras, raspberry pi, and phones will not register the very large capacity cards. Check your specs before ordering.

This card is OK for the price.  Notice that its writing speed is slow, therefore the waiting time for writing to file is long, meaning lost of frame if recording using for surveillance camera or longer waiting time if using for taking pictures.  Reading speed is ~90MB/s but I just  care about the writing speed.  My bad that I didn't know this before purchase!
it's a very good micro sd card. Does what it says it's going to do. Good price, decent storage. I've bought 3 so far for my electronics and haven't had any issues.

I have purchased sever of these and have encountered no problems with them. Item appears and performs like the genuine article and not some shady knockoff so I am very pleased. I am finding more and more bogus stuff when I buy something that has a really good price online, so I thought it might be helpful to mention my impression that it is a genuine Samsung memory card.

I ordered 3 of these to use with a Raspberry Pi cluster. They're fast and work great. Unfortunately there is a purchase limit of 3, so for the rest that I needed I just bought them from Samsung directly. It was the same price and also had free shipping.

I use this in a dash-cam and the capacity and speed work just fine.  Got tired of forgetting to put it back in the car after downloading it to my pc, so I use this as a backup and keep one in the car at all times.
No way to register or easily authenticate these cards. Getting a replacement after a failure could be like pulling teeth. A run around for sure. Good thing they're relatively cheap.
Samsung cards are the only cards that I like  buying these cards are suppose to last at least 10 years water resistant heat resistant  and x-ray resistant
great card  works as expected  even came with the adapter  to read it on the computer  i used it in a wireless camera  i have had no problems.  will buy again
This is a genuine Samsung product. The card was checked and it does actually have 128GB of storage with matching claimed speeds on both read and write.
Bought this for an outdoor camera and it works great! Saves around 4 days of HD quality. Hopefully it continues to work. I'll update the review if anything changes.

I don't have benchmarks for this but it's a cost effective and relatively fast card, especially for the budget. I'm using it in my Raspberry PI 3B+ and it's quite quick in that device. I kind of wish I had gone for the 64GB to get more storage space, but this is still a good deal! I'll be buying the Evo Select units again in the future if I need more.
Does the job i bought it for and seems to be a pretty decent micro sd card. Even came with the sd card adapter.Update...
The SD card only worked for 3 weeks. I was using it in dash cam and it was highly recommended by the dash cam support. No wonder both product ended up useless and defective.

I got this for a music alarm. Computer recognized it easy. Transfer rate was great. The alarm read the music fine and played clearly with no difficulty. This was one of the better prices for the space.

I ordered the 32 gig micro SD card. I got exactly 32 gigs. Not 30 or 31 or even 33. If precision is important to you, then getting the exact number of gigs you ordered is important. Rest assured that you get 32 gigs with this card. It is also actually in micro SD format. So there's that. And It's got a recognizable brand name. Don't ever trust a BillyBob 30+g(ish) small(ish) memory card thing.
Memory card - you have to buy two cards (how Samsung packages) & only needed the micro SD card, but exactly what I needed. Great seller & delivered on time!
Great. Works well, I use it for my GoPro and it works.
I like and recommend this product because of the quality and value.I don't care for the packaging, but whatever, not like I need to reuse it. :-))
I gave it a one only because unfortunately the item is smaller then expected and did not fit what it was purchased for.  it was otherwise a nice product seemed to be made wall and had nice features.

Very nice it actually has the room it says it does and it works great on my phone.  It stays connected unlike my last memory card.  I finally have enough room for all my games and photos, will probably get another for my tablet.

Finally an affordable option to record 1440p quality video on my dash cam. The brand I used for my dash cam had a minimum requirement of U3 and this did just the job. Great transfer speed too. Note: I only used this product for over a week and only use the front dash cam rather than simultaneously recording. Upon trying to record both I had not problem.

Buyer beware.  When the lock mechanism on the adaptor breaks (aka moves into the lock position when placing it into a laptop) it is unuseable to 'save' items/data onto.  Just called tech support and I would have to send the entire thing back (including the disk that is holding all of my data).  It is 1 week beyond my return deadline.  Figures.
I bought this to add to the cell phone that only came with a Sim Card.  The more I use the phone, the more I'll find use for the extra storage.

Can’t go wrong today Samsung is the number one leader in everything they passed the Japanese products . Highly recommended and the price is right where you can find it at EBay at much lower price but counterfeit made in China . Buy at Amazon direct Prime sold by Amazon OEM item.

Not much to say, it works as it should. I ordered  two of these for car video camera to record while driving. I put one in each vehicle, it's  usually full after 3-7 days depending  on the settings chosen and how much driving time.

I'm using this in a pi zero w that I made into a PiHole. Works great. The storage space is overkill for what I'm using it for but it was twice the storage for an extra $2 bucks. I would purchase again.

Cumple su función.  Vino con un adaptador que aún no he usado. Solo se la puse al celular sin a pagarlo ni nada y comenzó a funcionar desde ese momento el celular solo me pregunto que quiero guardar en ella. Luego de eso no he vuelto a tener problemas de espacio.

I do not know if one brand fails more often than other but so far so good with this Samsung memory chip.

I bought these to use for recording in my wyze camera. That camera takes a micro SD card. This has enough space to record for 2-4 days depending on the outside activity. It can easily be formatted via the phone. I would highly recommend this product.
I purchased this for Nintendo Switch and it worked!

Purchase to use with my 720P wireless outdoor security camera. The SD card can record all activities, it can be used over and over, no need to repurchase. I have always purchased SanDisk memory.  It works well, its fast and reliable.Only complaint I have (and its a good complaint) is: I have never had to use the lifetime warranty.

Product works just as expected.  I got this as a replacement for a gopro.  I also use it for other mini cameras.  The Sd Adapter works just fine.  I have formated the sd card several times to use in different devices without any problems.I will definitely purchase again.
if you're device can't read xd cards this is as high as you can go. so why not spend the extra $3-4 and get the fastest and most reliable card while you're at it. these and evo are all i buy anymore.
Works fine. Came with everything it was suppose to. No damage to the package or item itself. Authentic Samsung SD card. Decent storage for the price.

The price and quality is just right with these cards. I use them in my phone, 3D printer, and raspberry pi. No problems they just work and are as fast as I can expect for the price.

I bought this for a Nintendo Switch.  The Switch accepted it immediately, I've been able to install games to it, and they run smoothly.  No complaints.

using for my 2k dash cam which needed U3 card.. it works like a charm! its the fastest when I did a speed test. Really cool one.

Good sd card. I got it to free up the internal memory space in my daughter's tablet. My daughter has all her games, books, and Netflix stored on the card and has noticed no issues with their function since transferring over. Still lots of space to download more.

My Galaxy S4 has stopped restarting continually and shutting down randomly. My phone appears to have much fewer problems now after replacing my 16GB Kingston card with this card. It might be due to space, but I suspect this card might also be more compatible.

I bought this just to help my wife quickly get her new cellie going.  Naturally, it worked perfectly.  Her and I have a bunch of small, highly portable electronics using Micro SD cards for storage, so when the need arises, I buy the small-capacity Samsung 32 and 64 gigabyte (I started working on and with computers back in the 80s, and can't believe I now can call ANY gigabyte capacity small) sized cards for them.  I was very happy to discover (and start using) these cards long ago, because of the Samsung reputation primarily, and also because they are almost ridiculously inexpensive now on Amazon (and have been for quite some time).  They might not represent blazing fast, cutting edge tech, but they do the job, cost little, and are completely reliable.  Why buy cheap, slow and possibly unreliable no-name cards when Samsung quality is so available, and so affordable?  This is a no-brainer.
